meanings.definition: A mobile phone that performs many of the functions of a computer, typically having a touchscreen interface, Internet access, and an operating system capable of running downloaded apps.
meanings.sent1: My sister uses her smartphone to play games and watch videos.
meanings.sent2: I need to charge my smartphone because the battery is low.
meanings.sent3: The smartphone seemed to have a mind of its own, constantly buzzing with notifications.
meanings.sent4: Her smartphone was like a tiny wizard, granting her wishes with just a touch.
meanings.sent5: The smartphone was a pocket-sized wonder, connecting her to the world with a tap.

meanings.definition: A handheld device that combines cellular telephone capabilities with computing functions such as email, Internet browsing, and multimedia playback.
meanings.sent1: Dad's smartphone allows him to call his friends and check the weather.
meanings.sent2: I always carry my smartphone with me in case I need to look something up.
meanings.sent3: The smartphone became a detective tool, capturing photos of mysterious footprints.
meanings.sent4: In her hand, the smartphone transformed into a magic portal to faraway lands.
meanings.sent5: With a swipe, the smartphone revealed a treasure trove of information at her fingertips.
